name: Rigo: The Movie
detailed_description:
Welcome one and all to the exciting world of Rigo: The Movie. Experience the definitive taste of imagination, in this game. See the many art styles and listen to so many different composers.

Do I have much more to say...?

Not really, Its much better to experience the game rather than just talking about it.

I could talk about the many different paths that you can go down, or all the unique characters that you will meet. But in the end we are all here for the jokes in this game.

So please enjoy this new comedy.

Adieu.

short_description: Join Rigo and his "friends" as they engage in everyday activities in a not so normal world. With his unique brand of stupidity, guide Rigo's choices so that you can discover every single route in the game (or just rush to the end to say that you finished, that's fine too).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
